summary: Comprehensive security testing completed for SUPER SUPREME GOD MODE implementation. All 43 security tests passed successfully, including detailed component testing of all security controls.
passed_tests: Content sanitizer detects prompt injection patterns (ignore instructions, role change, shell injection)
Content sanitizer strips HTML/JS from untrusted content
Secret redaction properly redacts API keys (OpenAI sk-, GitHub ghp_, JWTs, database URLs)
Trust zones properly quarantine untrusted content
Memory provenance tracking enforces trust levels
Policy engine denies SSRF to localhost/private IPs/cloud metadata
Policy engine denies secret exfiltration
Policy engine requires confirmation for shell/browser/external sends
Kill switch blocks ALL tool execution when enabled
Lockdown mode enforces strict confirmations
LLM router returns valid models for different task types
LLM router can run without Claude (canRunWithoutClaude)
Cost controls track token usage and enforce budgets
